DataElement.preferredDefinition: The start date of deviation represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the protocol deviati
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the protocol deviation start date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start date that the protocol deviation using this format (DD-MON-YYYY). This should be the start or occurrence of the protocol deviation and not the date it was discovered or reported.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DVSTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable DVSTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This may be derived if not collected on a CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2434998 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

What was the protocol deviation date?
